about.headerSubtitle: Welcome to KomNeuf – Morocco's premier platform for second-hand and authentic clothing, where fashion finds a new life! We believe everyone deserves access to stylish, high-quality clothing that suits their taste and budget. That’s why KomNeuf offers an easy and trustworthy way for people across Morocco to buy and sell authentic clothes for men, women, kids, and even traditional attire.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At KomNeuf, our goal is to make luxury and authentic clothing accessible to everyone while encouraging a sustainable way of shopping. By choosing second-hand, you’re not only saving money but also helping to reduce waste and support a circular economy. We carefully verify the authenticity of every item to ensure you receive only the best – because your trust matters to us.

points.title: Guaranteed Authenticity
points.description: We’re committed to verifying each item so you can shop with confidence.

points.title: Inclusive Fashion for Every Budget
points.description: Our platform offers a range of options, from designer pieces to affordable finds, so you can dress your best without breaking the bank.

points.title: Sustainable and Stylish
points.description: Buying and selling second-hand is a small step that has a big impact. Join us in giving clothes a new life and making fashion more sustainable.

about.conclusion: Whether you’re looking for timeless traditional wear, stylish modern pieces, or luxury finds, KomNeuf is here to connect you with Morocco’s best in fashion. Join us and make fashion sustainable, accessible, and uniquely yours!

advertisePage.title: Advertise with KomNeuf
advertisePage.intro: Advertise with KomNeuf to connect with Morocco’s leading community for sustainable fashion. Our platform offers a unique opportunity to reach a targeted audience passionate about affordable, authentic clothing. With options like Featured Listings, Banner Ads, and Promoted Shops, your brand can gain maximum visibility where it matters most. By partnering with KomNeuf, you align with a brand committed to quality, sustainability, and community values. Expand your reach, boost your sales, and grow your brand with KomNeuf. Contact us today to explore tailored advertising opportunities!
advertisePage.learnMore: Want to learn more? Let us know by filling out the form below.
advertisePage.privacyPolicy: By submitting this form, you agree to our privacy policy.

worksPage.title: How KomNeuf Works
worksPage.description: KomNeuf is Morocco’s trusted platform for buying and selling authentic, second-hand fashion, where quality, sustainability, and affordability come together. We make it easy for everyone to access stylish, genuine clothing, from luxury pieces to traditional Moroccan wear. Join a community that’s passionate about sustainable fashion and make a positive impact on both your style and the environment!
worksPage.sellingTitle: Selling on KomNeuf in 3 Easy Steps
worksPage.listTitle: 1. Sign Up and Create Your Profile
worksPage.listDescription: Begin by creating a free account on KomNeuf. Set up a profile that showcases your style and makes it easy for buyers to connect with you.
worksPage.sellDescription: Listing an item is simple: take a few photos, write a detailed description, select the correct category (Men, Women, Kids, or Traditional), and set your price. Authenticity is key, so be sure to list only genuine items!
worksPage.paydayDescription: Once someone purchases your item, securely package it and ship it to the buyer. You’ll receive your payment once the item is confirmed as delivered.
worksPage.shoppingTitle: Buying on KomNeuf in 3 Easy Steps
worksPage.findDescription: Discover a wide selection of authentic, second-hand fashion. Use filters to easily find items by category, style, or price.
worksPage.buyDescription: Once you’ve found something you love, complete the transaction directly through our secure platform. You’ll have access to various payment options, including cash on delivery.
worksPage.getDescription: After receiving your item, try it on and enjoy! Don’t forget to leave a review to help support other shoppers in the KomNeuf community.
worksPage.safetyTitle: Safe Shopping and Selling with KomNeuf
worksPage.buyerDescription: At KomNeuf, the security of both buyers and sellers is our top priority. Every transaction is handled through our secure platform, where payments are processed safely, and sellers are only paid once the item reaches the buyer. To make sure everyone has a positive experience, we’ve built a system that promotes transparency and trust among all users.
worksPage.descriptionOrder: Our refund policy ensures peace of mind for every transaction. If an item doesn’t match its description or there’s an issue, buyers may be eligible for a refund. For more details on how we protect you, please review our [Terms and Conditions].

termsAndConditions.headerSubtitle: Welcome to KomNeuf, a platform that connects users across Morocco to buy and sell second-hand clothing in a safe and sustainable way. By using KomNeuf, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. Please read carefully, as they outline your rights and responsibilities as a user of our platform.

acceptanceOfTerms.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptanceOfTerms.content: By accessing or using KomNeuf, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using the platform.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: All users of KomNeuf must agree to respect others and act responsibly when buying, selling, and interacting on the platform. Users are expected to:
points: Only list authentic and legal items that adhere to Moroccan law.
Provide accurate descriptions and photos of the items listed.
Treat other users with respect, refraining from any discriminatory or abusive behavior.

points.title: Selling Illegal Items
points.description: Listing counterfeit, stolen, or illegal items is strictly prohibited. Any attempt to sell illegal goods will result in immediate account suspension, and relevant authorities may be notified.

points.title: Abusive or Discriminatory Behavior
points.description: Sexual abuse, harassment, racism, or discrimination of any kind will not be tolerated. Users who engage in such behaviors will be banned and may face reporting to authorities.

points.title: Item Ownership and Responsibility
points.description: KomNeuf is a platform that connects buyers and sellers and does not take ownership of items listed. Sellers are responsible for the items they list, and buyers are responsible for carefully reviewing each item before purchasing.

points.title: Loss or Damage
points.description: KomNeuf is not liable for any loss, damage, or theft of items before, during, or after delivery. Buyers and sellers are encouraged to use reputable shipping options to ensure secure delivery.

points.title: Service Charges and Delivery Fees
points.description: KomNeuf charges a service fee and delivery fee for each transaction, which will be deducted from the total amount paid by the buyer.

points.title: Payment Release to Sellers
points.description: Sellers will receive payments after the service fees and delivery charges have been deducted. Payments are released to the seller only once the buyer has confirmed receipt of the item.

points.title: Refunds and Disputes
points.description: If a buyer believes an item was misrepresented, they may request a refund. Refund eligibility will be determined by KomNeuf's policies, and further details can be found in our Refund Policy.

points.title: Shipping Responsibility
points.description: Sellers are responsible for packaging items securely before shipping. KomNeuf is not liable for any delays, damages, or losses incurred during delivery. We encourage both buyers and sellers to use reliable delivery services to minimize risks.

points.title: Confirming Delivery
points.description: Buyers are responsible for confirming receipt of items promptly. Once delivery is confirmed, the seller will receive payment, and the transaction will be considered complete.

privacyAndSecurity.title: Privacy and Security
privacyAndSecurity.content: KomNeuf values your privacy and takes steps to protect your information. By using our platform, you agree to our data collection and handling practices as outlined in our Privacy Policy.

accountTermination.title: Account Termination
accountTermination.content: KomNeuf reserves the right to suspend or terminate accounts at its discretion if users violate any of the above policies. Serious violations, such as selling illegal items or engaging in abusive behavior, will result in immediate termination and potential reporting to Moroccan authorities.

amendmentsToTermsAndConditions.title: Amendments to Terms and Conditions
amendmentsToTermsAndConditions.content: KomNeuf may update these Terms and Conditions as necessary. Users will be notified of any significant changes, and continued use of the platform implies acceptance of the revised terms.

contactInformation.title: Contact Information
contactInformation.content: If you have any questions regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at  info@komneuf.ma

termsAndConditions.conclusion: By using KomNeuf, you agree to adhere to these Terms and Conditions and to foster a respectful and trustworthy community for second-hand fashion in Morocco.

offerModal.title: ✨ Exclusive Offer ✨
offerModal.freeShipping: For a limited time only, we’re offering
offerModal.exclusiveDeal: Don’t miss out on this exclusive deal to shop your favorites without the extra cost. Hurry, this offer won’t last long!

senditTracking.title: Track Your Order
senditTracking.description: You can track your packages 24/7, wherever you are, simply enter your package code and click on tracker
senditTracking.error: Error fetching data. Please check the tracking number and try again.
